resources.string: Welcome to the settings. Touch on any option in order to reveal information about it. Use the android back key to return to previous page.
Welcome to the search. Scroll the date picker to your desired setting and click submit and you will be redirected to the dashboard with the image from said date.
Welcome to the dashboard. This screen is simply for viewing the image and its explanation. Touch the navigation menu in the top-right corner to traverse through the application.
